tag_list: website-for-mothers, moms-website, site-for-working-women, moms-chat, mothers-blog, moms-question-and-answer
overview:
Bhavani Raman, Founder, www.chennaimoms.com, had relocated from the United States of America to Chennai. Though, she had an extended family of relatives and friends, she could not find the information she needed like which is the best school for her son, kid friendly restaurants, reliable baby sitters. She had to hunt around for this information and it was a tedious process. But the information she collected was of much use to her friends. If itâ€™s useful to her friends, why not put it to use for a bigger circle?

She being an IT engineer, she promptly got to work and thus www.chennaimoms.com was born!
